title: Did an Oklahoma Man Rescue a Dog That Had Been Chained to a Cage in the Woods?
subtitle: Two stories about dogs found in the woods were combined by a viral content website looking to tell an even more dramatic tale.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: A man walking his dogs in the woods in Broken Arrow, Oklahoma, stumbled upon a cage with a heavy chain and saw what he thought was a beaver. It turned out to be a dog.
